mapper.select: SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(fb.fb_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS fb_num, fb.mbr_id, fbc.fbctg_name, fb.fb_title, fb.fb_content, fb.fb_date, fb.fb_views, fb.fb_attachment_file, fb.fb_like FROM free_board fb INNER JOIN free_board_category fbc USING(fbctg_code) WHERE fb_is_deleted = 'active' ORDER BY fb_date DESC, fb_num DESC LIMIT #{rowPerPage} OFFSET #{offset};
SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(fbctg_code, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS categoryCode, fbctg_name AS categoryName FROM free_board_category
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_board fb INNER JOIN free_board_category fbc USING(fbctg_code) WHERE fbc.fbctg_code = CONCAT('fbcate_00', #{categoryCode}) ORDER BY fb_date DESC;

SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(fb.fb_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS fb_num, fb.mbr_id, fbc.fbctg_name, fb.fb_title, fb.fb_content, fb.fb_date, fb.fb_views, fb.fb_attachment_file, fb.fb_like FROM free_board fb INNER JOIN free_board_category fbc USING(fbctg_code) WHERE fbc.fbctg_code = CONCAT('fbcate_00', #{categoryCode}) AND fb_is_deleted = 'active' ORDER BY fb_date DESC LIMIT #{pageable.rowPerPage} OFFSET #{pageable.offset};

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM free_board fb
fb.fb_date > NOW() - INTERVAL ${searchArticle.days} DAY
AND ${searchArticle.searchFilter} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchArticle.searchValue}, '%')
ORDER BY fb_date DESC;

SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(fb.fb_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS fb_num, fb.mbr_id, fbc.fbctg_name, fb.fb_title, fb.fb_content, fb.fb_date, fb.fb_views, fb.fb_attachment_file, fb.fb_like FROM free_board fb INNER JOIN free_board_category fbc USING(fbctg_code)
fb.fb_date > NOW() - INTERVAL ${searchArticle.days} DAY
AND ${searchArticle.searchFilter} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchArticle.searchValue}, '%')
AND fb_is_deleted = 'active'
ORDER BY fb_date DESC, fb_num DESC LIMIT #{pageable.rowPerPage} OFFSET #{pageable.offset};

SELECT CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(fb.fb_num, '_', -1) AS UNSIGNED) AS fb_num, fb.mbr_id, fbc.fbctg_name, fb.fb_title, fb.fb_content, fb.fb_date, fb.fb_views, fb.fb_attachment_file, fb.fb_like FROM free_board fb INNER JOIN free_board_category fbc USING(fbctg_code) WHERE fb.fb_num = #{articleKeyNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE free_board SET fb_is_deleted='delete' WHERE fb_num=#{articleKeyNum}
